content: Bank Account Travel Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Aug 2019How should I buy or transfer Swiss francs from Singapore to Geneva?I am going to work in Geneva for three years, and I will be paid in SGD. I suppose I will definitely need a local Swiss bank account when I am there?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hui Wai KitLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 25 Sep 2019If you need to transfer SGD - CHF or vice versa, you can check out the remittance services like InstaReM or TransferWise. You can find out more here: https://seedly.sg/reviews/remittanceI used TransferWise personally, so should you decide to use TransferWise, here's a referral code to get a free transfer of up to $500: transferwise.com/u/waih470 comments1
